resource: 1002187.derived=false 1002187.vtc=true 1002187.source=MANUAL_IMPORT 1002187.description=All-wheel-drive models come equipped with run-flat tires. Run-flat tire technology is designed for limited emergency use only. If air pressure is lost, vehicle speed must remain below 55 miles per hour; cornering, braking and accelerating must be done with extreme caution; and tire should be replaced within 100 miles. See your Toyota dealer for details.
